data.title: Robert Bontine Cunninghame Graham
data.meta_description: Adventurer, story and travel writer. He travelled extensively in South America, hoping to make his fortune. He failed. In 1879 he married the Chilean poet, Gabriela de la Balmondiere
data.text:
Male : Adventurer, story and travel writer. He travelled extensively in South America, hoping to make his fortune. He failed. In 1879 he married the Chilean poet, Gabriela de la Balmondiere

Nationality : Scottish Place of Birth : London

Date of Birth : 1852 Date of Death : 1936 Age : 84

Other Work : MP for NW Lanarkshire 1886-92 & joing the ILP, helped Kier Hardie organise the Scottish Labour Party. In 1928 became the first President of the Scottish National Party

Education : Harrow
